targets.query: SELECT "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "path" = '/var/run' AND "device" =~ /^$Disk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device"
SELECT mean("delay") AS "RTT" FROM "gateways" WHERE $timeFilter AND "gateway_name" =~ /^$Gateway$/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "gateway_name"

SELECT
  (max("bytes_recv") - min("bytes_recv")) AS "Total Download",
  (max("bytes_sent") - min("bytes_sent")) AS "Total Upload"
FROM "net"
WHERE $timeFilter AND "interface" =~ /^$WAN$/
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s) *8 FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$LAN_Interfaces$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pf" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: pfSense
list.name: Host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pf" WITH KEY = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "device" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/
list.name: Disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "device" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "gateways" WITH KEY = "gateway_name" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/
list.name: Gateway
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "gateways" WITH KEY = "gateway_name" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "gateways" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/
list.label: WAN
list.name: WAN
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "gateways" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/
list.description: LAN interfaces (excludes enc0 and WAN interfaces)
list.label: LAN
list.name: LAN_Interfaces
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ and cpu !~ /cpu-total/
list.name: CPU
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ and cpu !~ /cpu-total/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "temperature" WITH KEY = "sensor" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/
list.name: Sensor
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "temperature" WITH KEY = "sensor" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/
